commit_message:
feat(specks-core): add session state management module

Implement Session struct matching Spec S01 schema with SessionStatus enum
(pending, in_progress, completed, failed, needs_reconcile). Add load_session
and save_session functions for JSON persistence. Include now_iso8601 utility
for timestamp generation.
warnings: Manual policy: staged files only, awaiting user commit. Commit message saved to git-commit-message.txt
